description: Aspose.Words for .NET class library supports DOC, DOCX, RTF, HTML, OpenDocument, PDF, XPS, EPUB and other formats. With Aspose.Words you can generate, modify, convert, render and print documents without utilizing Microsoft Word®
releaseNotes:
There are 93 improvements and fixes in this regular monthly release. The most notable are:

• Revision bars are displayed in rendered documents
• Proper support for SDT repeating section 
• Chinese list bullet numbers supported 
• Field update engine performance improved
• Better support for TIFF image compression CCIT3/CCIT4
• Improved automatic color resolution in DrawingML Charts rendering

This release introduces the new features, enhancements and fixes to the excptions/bugs as detailed below:

• New features
WORDSNET-3774	Red text in picture becomes white when rendering to TIFF
WORDSNET-6236	Logo textures are not prominent when saving to TIFF
WORDSNET-7279	Consider providing a JoinRunsWithSameFormatting method that works on Paragraph level
WORDSNET-7309	Doc to Tiff conversion issue with image rendering
WORDSNET-7921	Support page-break-inside style attribute for tr
WORDSNET-8224	Track Changes Options - Support of changed lines (bars) upon rendering/converting to PDF.
WORDSNET-8226	Support inserting the text marked by a Bookmark in Bookmark field
WORDSNET-8517	Support of Gradient color rendering in Tiff when TiffCompression.Ccitt3/Ccitt4 is used
WORDSNET-8770	Support revision bars
WORDSNET-8888	SDT repeatingSection is not converted properly.
WORDSNET-9117	Consider exporting to fonts in .ttf format during rendering to HtmlFixed format
WORDSNET-9178	Improve auto color mechanism for data points.
WORDSNET-9196	Add feature to remove Office 2003 Routing Slip meta data

• Enhancements
WORDSJAVA-382	Arrow ends are not rendered to graphics on Java
WORDSJAVA-815	Update EULA to 22 Oct 2013

WORDSNET-4115	List numbering is lost after open/save document using AW.	Enhancement

WORDSNET-7242	Document.Save take much time on saving Fixed Page Formats	Enhancement

WORDSNET-8795	Change year to 2013 in evaluation message	Enhancement

WORDSNET-8960	Common paragraph border is lost during DOCX-HTML-DOCX round trip	Enhancement

WORDSNET-9286	Update EULA to 22 Oct 2013 version	Enhancement

title: Aspose.Words for .Net
